Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-ActShortStayEncounterCode

Language: en

  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    SSshort stayAn encounter where the patient is admitted to a health care facility for a predetermined length of time, usually less than 24 hours.

name: ActShortStayEncounterCode
title: ActShortStayEncounterCode
description: **Definition:**An encounter where the patient is admitted to a health care facility for a predetermined length of time, usually less than 24 hours.
